articles.content: Golden State Warriors teammates Stephen Curry, Klay Thompson, and Draymond Green seemed right at home celebrating their fourth title on Thursday night in Boston following a 103-90 win over the Celtic… [+11998 chars]

articles.author: David Coverdale
articles.title: Transgender cyclist Emily Bridges faces being blocked from major events for another TWO years - Daily Mail
articles.description: DAVID COVERDALE: On Thursday the UCI updated their transgender policy, lowering the maximum testosterone level to 2.5 nmol/L and increasing the transition period to 24 months.
articles.content:
British transgender rider Emily Bridges faces being blocked from major events for at least another two years after cyclings world governing body announced new, stricter rules.
The UCI previously all… [+1621 chars]

articles.author: Laura Fox
articles.title: David Beckham admits 2006 World Cup WAG brigade went 'too far' after they stole the show in Germany - Daily Mail
articles.description: The glamorous beauties famously commanded the spotlight during the tournament, garnering more attention than their player husbands who actually took to the pitch in Germany.
articles.content:
David Beckham has revealed that the 2006 World Cup WAG brigade, which included his wife Victoria, went 'too far' after they stole the show during the 2006 World Cup.
